title: Transportation: Train (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Train subcategory within Transportation. Includes 6 card(s).

cards.english: Will this train go to Tokyo Station?
cards.japanese: 東京駅まで行きますか？

cards.romaji: Tsugi no eki wa Osaka desu.

cards.japanese: 電車の切符を買います。

cards.english: Have you ever taken the Shinkansen?
cards.romaji: Shinkansen ni notta koto ga arimasu ka.
cards.japanese: 新幹線に乗ったことがありますか。

cards.english: While local trains are all non smoking, some bullet trains have a few cars where smoking is allowed.
cards.romaji: Zairaisen ga subete kin'en nanoni taishi, shinkansen niwa kitsuen shary. ga aru b i ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 在来線がすべて禁煙なのに対し、新幹線には喫煙車両がある場合があります。
